channel.title: Is this a real command or is it bull?
channel.description: Hey, i remember a code that you could type into a server and become an instant player mod or game mod. It was ::mod 1 (1 for player) or ::mod 2 (2 for game). I tried this in a server and it said mod lvl changed, loggout once. I did and nothing happened. Is this a true code or is it bull?

item.title: Is this a real command or is it bull?
item.dc:creator: @bam_bam bam bam
item.description:
@bam_bam wrote:

[quote=“marsvolta6, post:7, topic:3647”]so type in for ::searchfor mod 1 for player mod or searchfor mod 2…if im wrong please give me the correct command…i thiught it was ::mod 1 but nothuing happens[/quote]I think he means in the Java source files, although I am by no means a Java expert.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a real command or is it bull?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Make one, it depends on the source, just do something like this:

if(command.startsWith("mod")) {
int newMod = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if(playerRights < 4)  
playerRights = newMod

sendMessage("Mod level set to "+newmod);
}

Under customCommand(String) of course XD

Read full topic
